extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN327; FREN427.

basic.description: A study of cultural representations in contemporary film. Special topics may include women in cinema, culture and identity in French and/or Francophone cinema, history through cinema, avant-garde cinema and the 'nouvelle vague'. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 427/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le Cinéma aujourd'hui: Études thématiques
